title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti according to package directions.
While the pasta cooks, sauté the guanciale in a pan until crispy. Remove the guanciale and leave the fat in the pan.
In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs with the cheese and a generous amount of black pepper.
Drain the spaghetti, reserving some pasta water. Toss the hot spaghetti in the pan with the guanciale fat.
Quickly add the egg mixture, stirring vigorously to create a creamy sauce. Add a splash of pasta water if needed to loosen the sauce. Serve immediately.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken in yogurt, cumin, and paprika for at least 30 minutes.
Grill or pan-fry the chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pot, sauté ginger-garlic paste, then add crushed tomatoes and cook until the sauce thickens.
Stir in the heavy cream and the cooked chicken. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with rice or naan bread.
